content: 153 sts ties in the next row rs start knitting the first tie on the 7 sts of the garter stitch border using two double pointed needles leaving the remaining sts on the main needle spring spirits kerchief 2015 ©design by yulia zakhlebina yuliazakh designs@gmail com * free pattern * for the personal use only spring spirits kerchief page 3 of 4 work the tie as follows row 1 rs k7 row 2 ws k7 repeat row 1-2 to desired length about 20 cm bobble these 7 stitches after final repeat of row 2 cut yarn symbols k pattern repeat join your yarn and bobble the remaining sts very loosely except for the last 7 sts of garter stitch border on these 7 sts make the second tie the same way as you did the first one o yo z point of blocking finishing l k2tog knit 2 stitches  s2kp slip 2 stitches together a decrease knitwise together knit weave in the ends block the kerchief the points of blocking are shown on chart c 1stitch pass slipped stitches together over the knitted one 2 stitches have been how to work with charts decreased s ssk slip slip knit these a make 3 out of 1 rs knit there is a garter stitch border which is formed by always knitting the first and the last seven 2 stitches together a 1 stitch yarn over knit 1 sts decrease stitch 2 stitches have been increased ws purl 1 center stitch rs row knit ws row purl stitch purl 1 stitch through the back loop purl 1 stitch the center stitch and the garter stitch border are not shown on the charts a sk2p slip 1 knit 2 the charts show rs row only in ws row purl all stitches stitches together pass slipped stitch over the k2tog 2 stitches have the charts are symmetrical and show one half of the shawl only knit all the charts as been decreased follows garter stitch border knit acc to chart till center stitch center stitch knit acc to chart till last 7 sts garter stitch border spring spirits kerchief 2015 ©design by yulia zakhlebina yuliazakh designs@gmail com * free pattern * for the personal use only spring spirits
